thread.title: DIARY-Emerging Markets Economic Events to Aug 13
thread.title_full: DIARY-Emerging Markets Economic Events to Aug 13 | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: DIARY-Emerging Markets Economic Events to Aug 13
text:
July 31 (Reuters) -
For other diaries, please see:
Top economic events
Government debt auctions
Political and general news events
Index of all diaries
Guide to economic indicators
** This Diary is filed daily *** FRIDAY, JULY 31 MOSCOW - Central bank of Russia announces interest rate decision - 1100 GMT. TUESDAY, AUGUST 4 BUCHAREST - Central bank of Romania holds interest rate meeting - 0800 GMT. MUMBAI - Reserve Bank of India holds monetary policy meeting. BUDAPEST - Central bank of Hungary non-rate-setting meeting. WEDNESDAY, AUGUST 5 BANGKOK - Bank of Thailand holds Monetary Policy Committee meeting - 0730 GMT. NAIROBI - Central bank of Kenya holds monetary policy meeting. BUDAPEST - Central bank of Hungary will publish the minutes of July policy meeting - 1200 GMT.
THURSDAY, AUGUST 6 PRAGUE - Czech National Bank holds monetary policy meeting to announce interest rate decision - 1100 GMT. The bank will also update its quarterly macroeconomic forecast.
TUESDAY, AUGUST 11 LUSAKA - Bank of Zambia announces interest rate decision - 0600 GMT. THURSDAY, AUGUST 13 SEOUL - Bank of Korea holds Monetary Policy Committee Meeting - 0100 GMT.
